data.title: Yuko Kobayashi
data.text:
Japanese voice actress

Yuko Kobayashi (小林 優子, Kobayashi Yūko, born February 6, 1961 in Tokyo) is a Japanese actress, voice actress and narrator, currently affiliated with 81 Produce and married to voice actor Mitsuaki Hoshino.
